thread.section_title: Novadown Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Novadown | www.novadown.co.nz
thread.title: Christabel Pilgrim

author: Christabel Pilgrim
title: Christabel Pilgrim
text: We discovered Novadown while searching for a 'Made in New Zealand' not just 'designed in New Zealand' duvet for our daughter. My Grandma had given me a down duvet as a 4yr old that was there for me, keeping me warm and comfortable, right through till my marriage and the need for a bigger one! I am sure the lovely duck down 4 seasons duvet we have now invested in for our daughter will do the same. Thank you very much for staying in New Zealand and providing such a great quality product.
